1. Most of your booking & refund related queries can be answered by logging into your Profile > Purchase History. Please register and login before the purchase to avoid many booking related issues.

 2. In case money is deducted and booking failed, please be rest assured that you will receive the refund in max 5-7 working days. You can check Refund status in the Profile > Purchase History.

 3. Opt refund to 'BMS Cash' to get Instant credit for future purchases.

 4. Ticket cancellation is available for most of the cinemas. However, there are certain exceptions such as offer/loyalty points applied, cut-off time exceeded, monthly cancellation limit (3 times) exhausted, etc. which can prevent you from going ahead with the cancellation. Please note that there is no ticket cancellation applicable.
